item.title: At least 36 dead and hundreds missing after fire engulfs Hong Kong tower blocks
item.description: Firefighters are struggling to put out the flames and say they are unsure when the blaze will be fully contained.

item.title: Georgia judge dismisses 2020 election interference case against Trump
item.description: The state charges were the last remaining criminal case against the US president stemming from the 2020 election.

item.title: Soldiers seize power in Guinea-Bissau and detain the president
item.description: The military takeover comes as the West African nation was awaiting the results of Sunday's election.

item.title: 'I am devastated': Hong Kong residents in disbelief after fire destroys blocks of flats
item.description: Efforts to control the blaze are continuing as locals wait for news of missing loved ones.

item.title: What we know about the Hong Kong apartment fires
item.description: The death toll continues to rise and hundreds are missing, as firefighters struggle to put out the fire.
